description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，台湾民主自治同盟委员。二二八事件后加入中国共产党在台地下组织，后前往中国大陆，曾参与宝钢建厂工作。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and the Taiwan Democratic Self-Government League. He joined the CCP's underground organization in Taiwan after the February 28 Incident, later moved to mainland China, and participated in the construction of Baosteel.

description.zh-cn: 李舜雨之父，台湾农民运动人士，后转变为反日民族运动家，并参与中国共产党在台湾的活动。
description.en: Father of Li Shunyu, a Taiwanese peasant movement activist who later became an anti-Japanese nationalist and participated in the activities of the Chinese Communist Party in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台中市工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台中市工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台湾台中地区的地下组织，由李舜雨、谢富、张伯哲等人于1948年成立。
description.en: The underground organization of the Chinese Communist Party in the Taichung area of Taiwan, established in 1948 by Li Shunyu, Xie Fu, Zhang Bozhe, and others.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台湾的省级领导机构，负责指导包括台中市工作委员会在内的各地区组织。
description.en: The provincial-level leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Taiwan, responsible for directing regional organizations including the Taichung City Working Committee.

nodes.id: 中华全国台湾同胞联谊会

zh-cn: 中华全国台湾同胞联谊会

description.zh-cn: 1945年二战后由李乔松、杨逵、谢雪红等人在台湾筹组的政治团体。
description.en: A political group formed in Taiwan after World War II in 1945 by Li Qiaosong, Yang Kui, Xie Xuehong, and others.

description.zh-cn: 由李伟光领导的在上海的台湾同乡组织，曾是中国共产党在上海联系台湾地下工作的据点。
description.en: An association for Taiwanese fellows in Shanghai led by Li Weiguang, which served as a base for the Chinese Communist Party to connect with underground work in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生在台湾的官民冲突事件，深刻影响了台湾的政治走向，并促使李舜雨等一批台湾青年加入中国共产党。
description.en: A conflict between officials and civilians in Taiwan in 1947, which profoundly affected Taiwan's political direction and prompted a group of Taiwanese youth, including Li Shunyu, to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 指在中国抗日战争期间，台湾知识分子中出现的反对日本侵略和殖民统治的思想及行动。
description.en: Refers to the anti-Japanese aggression and colonial rule thoughts and actions that emerged among Taiwanese intellectuals during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期的一个行政区，是李舜雨的出生地。
description.en: An administrative division during the period of Japanese rule in Taiwan, and the birthplace of Li Shunyu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，李舜雨晚年生活并病逝于此。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China, where Li Shunyu lived in his later years and passed away.

description.zh-cn: 台湾共产党创始人之一，与李乔松、李舜雨一同参与政治活动。
description.en: One of the founders of the Taiwanese Communist Party, who participated in political activities with Li Qiaosong and Li Shunyu.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，与李乔松、李舜雨一同参与政治活动。
description.en: A Taiwanese political figure who participated in political activities with Li Qiaosong and Li Shunyu.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，与李乔松、李舜雨一同参与政治活动，并共同创立中共台中市工作委员会。
description.en: A Taiwanese political figure who participated in political activities with Li Qiaosong and Li Shunyu, and co-founded the CCP Taichung City Working Committee.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家及社会运动家，与李乔松等人共同筹组台湾人民协会。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer and social activist who co-founded the Taiwan People's Association with Li Qiaosong and others.

description.zh-cn: 旅沪台湾同乡会负责人，指示李舜雨返台从事中共地下工作。
description.en: Leader of the Shanghai Taiwan Fellows' Association who instructed Li Shunyu to return to Taiwan for CCP underground work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会中部地区负责人，李舜雨曾协助其发展组织。
description.en: Head of the central region for the CCP Taiwan Provincial Working Committee, whom Li Shunyu assisted in developing the organization.

description.zh-cn: 由中共派遣，与李舜雨、谢富等人共同创立中共台中市工作委员会。
description.en: Dispatched by the CCP, he co-founded the CCP Taichung City Working Committee with Li Shunyu, Xie Fu, and others.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，根据其回忆，他是由李舜雨领导加入中国共产党的。
description.en: A Taiwanese political figure who, according to his memoir, was led by Li Shunyu to join the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台中市工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年，李舜雨前往山东解放区加入中国人民解放军，并参与了上海战役。
description.en: In 1949, Li Shunyu went to the Shandong Liberated Area, joined the People's Liberation Army, and participated in the Shanghai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1977年至1984年间，李舜雨参与宝钢建厂工作直至退休。
description.en: From 1977 to 1984, Li Shunyu participated in the construction of Baosteel until his retirement.

relationships.target: 中华全国台湾同胞联谊会

description.zh-cn: 1946年，李舜雨前往上海并居住在由李伟光领导的旅沪台湾同乡会。
description.en: In 1946, Li Shunyu went to Shanghai and stayed at the Shanghai Taiwan Fellows' Association led by Li Weiguang.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，李舜雨在上海接受李伟光的指示，返台从事地下工作。
description.en: In 1946, Li Shunyu received instructions from Li Weiguang in Shanghai to return to Taiwan for underground work.

description.zh-cn: 1947年底，李舜雨潜回台湾，协助中共台湾省工委中部地区负责人洪幼樵发展组织。
description.en: At the end of 1947, Li Shunyu secretly returned to Taiwan to assist Hong Youqiao, the head of the central region of the CCP Taiwan Provincial Working Committee, in developing the organization.

description.zh-cn: 根据陈明忠的回忆，他加入中国共产党时由李舜雨领导宣誓。
description.en: According to Chen Mingzhong's recollection, he was led by Li Shunyu when he took the oath to join the Chinese Communist Party.

position.en: Central Committee Member and Propaganda Minister

relationships.source: 中国共产党台中市工作委员会
中国共产党台中市工作委员会
中国共产党台中市工作委员会
中国共产党台中市工作委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 二二八事件的爆发促使李舜雨于1947年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: The outbreak of the February 28 Incident prompted Li Shunyu to join the Chinese Communist Party in March 1947.

description.zh-cn: 1937年日中战争全面爆发，促使台湾知识分子中出现反日思想。
description.en: The full-scale outbreak of the Sino-Japanese War in 1937 prompted the emergence of anti-Japanese sentiment among Taiwanese intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 反日思想使李乔松由社会运动者转变为支持反日民族运动家。
description.en: Anti-Japanese sentiment transformed Li Qiaosong from a social activist into a supporter of the anti-Japanese national movement.

description.zh-cn: 因坚持不改日本名等反日问题，李舜雨于1942年遭到校方开除。
description.en: Due to anti-Japanese issues such as refusing to change his name to a Japanese one, Li Shunyu was expelled from his school in 1942.

description.zh-cn: 1948年10月，因中共地下党身份暴露，李舜雨遭到中华民国政府通缉，被迫逃亡。
description.en: In October 1948, after his identity as a CCP underground member was exposed, Li Shunyu was wanted by the Republic of China government and forced to flee.
